channel.title: Help With Finding Color
channel.description:
I dont know any forum that knows macro programs as well as this one, so i think you guys can help me
This isnt a SCAR question, so please dont get mad at me... I am trying to write a auto cutting and banker with SunMacro, but i dont know how to make it add a command that makes it click the bank symbol, heres ALL the functions
[code]LeftDown LeftUp LeftClick MiddleDown MiddleUp MiddleClick RightDown RightUp RightClick SilentClick X, Y as Long SetCursorPos MouseMoveSmooth X, Y as Long MouseMoveSmoothEx(X, Y, Steps, Minsleep, Maxsleep, Range, Forces, Forcepow As Integer) LeftClickAt X, Y as Long RightClickAt X, Y as Long FindColor Color as String FindColorSpiral Color, SelWND.hdc, X, Y, X1, Y1, X2, X2 TestColor Color as String FindBitmap BitmapInString as String FindBitmapMask Pictures.#, X1, Y1, X2, Y2, TransparentC as String) FindBitmapSpiral() ClearLog GoToSub "Sub" as Long SendKeys "Say" as String GetNews tScreenshot Name, Number as Long WriteLn "Say" as String WaitS Seconds as String WaitMs Miliseconds as String End Sub[/code]
What would i type to make it find the color 53247, and then click on it?
And please, dont get mad that this isnt a SCAR question, i cant figure this out.

item.title: Help With Finding Color
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

The code would be:

// vars needed
var
  x, y, x2, y2 : Integer;

begin
  // code
  GetClientDimensions(x2, y2);
  if (FindColor(x, y, 53247, 0, 0, x2, y2)) then
    ClickMouse(x, y, True);
end.

Make sure to set the dimensions using SRL. They have constants for the dimensions of RuneScape, it may help to look those up. Also, there might be a function which finds the bank symbol. It would be more useful to you if you posted on www.srl-forums.com.

~Ron

Read full topic
